name: Business Insider - No Ads or Ad-Blocker Message
description: No ads and ad blocker on http://www.businessinsider.com/
additional_info:
V1 - simple code to remove ad blocker message @ businessinsider.com - I don't like using other peoples stylesheets when I can create my own so if this is like anyone elses code then sorry but I garauntee I wrote this from scratch.

V2 - added full ad removal, so don't even need ad-blocker (but this still removes the message). Re-wrote from scratch as V1 didn't seem to work anymore.
